Claude 4.5 Opus.description: Anthropic's most powerful 'work' model. It is by far the best model for coding and writing, excelling at complex reasoning, detailed analysis, and nuanced content creation.
features: Best-in-class for writing, editing, and coding
Does not train on user data by default

Claude 4.5 Sonnet.description: Anthropic's fast 'chat' model. It's designed for quick, conversational interactions, brainstorming, and everyday tasks. It is the default model in the Claude interface.
features: Best for expressive writing and brainstorming

Gemini 3.0 Pro.description: Google's latest powerful 'work' model. Gemini 3.0 Pro features improved reasoning, directness, and multimodal coherence compared to 2.5. It maintains the massive context window while being more efficient and less verbose by default.
features: Better multimodal synthesis (text, images, audio, video)
Can create video with the Veo 3 model

Gemini 3.0 Flash.description: Google's latest fast 'chat' model. Gemini 3.0 Flash is more direct and efficient than 2.5 Flash, with improved multimodal capabilities and an excellent voice mode that can use your phone's camera for real-time input.
features: Excellent multimodal voice mode with camera support
Good for quick questions and brainstorming

Gemini 3.0 (Veo).description: Google's video generation capability, available exclusively in Gemini 3.0. Veo can create short, photorealistic video clips from text descriptions. This is an experimental feature accessed through the Gemini interface.

Gemini 2.5 Pro (legacy).description: Google's previous-generation 'work' model. While still capable, Gemini 3.0 Pro is recommended for new work due to its improved reasoning and efficiency.

Gemini 2.5 Flash (legacy).description: Google's previous-generation fast 'chat' model. Gemini 3.0 Flash is recommended for new work due to better directness and efficiency.

GPT 5.1.description: OpenAI's new flagship 'work' model for deep reasoning and complex tasks. Use it for multi-step logical deduction and investigative research.

Codex (GPT 5.1).description: OpenAI's specialized coding model powered by GPT 5.1. This is the recommended OpenAI tool for all coding tasks, offering superior code generation, debugging, and project scaffolding.
features: Better code quality than general-purpose models

Gemini (Nano Banana üçå).description: Google's latest, fastest, and most efficient image model, also known as Gemini 2.5 Flash Image. Its native multimodal architecture allows for powerful conversational editing, multi-image composition, and accurate text rendering.

NotebookLM.description: Google's research and writing assistant that is grounded in your chosen source documents. It helps you get summaries, ask questions, and generate ideas based only on the material you provide, reducing hallucinations.
features: Generates summaries, FAQs, and audio overviews
Excellent for analyzing collections of documents

Grok 3.description: Developed by xAI, Grok is the only major LLM with real-time integration with a social media platform (X/Twitter), making it an indispensable tool for monitoring breaking news.

Perplexity.description: An AI-powered search engine that provides direct answers to queries with citations. It's designed for research and finding information, functioning as a 'conversational search engine'.
features: Provides answers with inline source citations
Excellent for fact-checking and initial research
Focus mode for searching specific domains (e.g., academic papers)

Open Source Models.description: A category of smaller, often open-source models (like those from Mistral, Llama, or Qwen) that are extremely fast and can be run locally on your own machine. They are ideal for quick tasks and workflows where privacy is paramount.
features: Can run on local hardware (via Ollama, etc.)
Good for simple, quick code generation

ElevenLabs.description: A specialized AI tool for high-quality, realistic voice synthesis. It's the industry leader for generating voiceovers, podcast audio, and other narrated content.
features: Fine-grained control over voice emotion and pacing

Midjourney.description: A premier AI image generation service known for producing highly artistic, detailed, and aesthetically pleasing images. It operates primarily through the Discord platform.
features: Strong control over style and composition
